title: Implement show=ALL in LukeRequestHandler
description: There are currently 4 options for the "show" field defined in the LukeRequestHandler: schema, index, doc, and all.  Schema, doc, and index are implemented, but "all" is not.  My thought is that show=all would populate the "index", "fields", and "schema" section of the response.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I'm not sure it's a bug, but I can confirm that show=all still doesn't work although I can see in LukeRequestHandler.java that all is one of the accepted values for show.
